interrupt.name: RESET
interrupt.caption: External Pin, Power-on Reset, Brown-out Reset and Watchdog Reset

bitfield.caption: Preserve EEPROM through the Chip Erase cycle
bitfield.name: EESAVE

value.caption: Boot Flash size=256 words Boot address=$4F00
value.name: 256W_4F00

value.name: 512W_4E00

value.name: 2048W_4800

value.caption: LPM and SPM prohibited in Application Section
value.name: LPM_SPM_DISABLE

value.caption: No lock on SPM and LPM in Application Section
value.name: NO_LOCK

value.caption: LPM and SPM prohibited in Boot Section
value.name: LPM_SPM_DISABLE

value.name: NO_LOCK

bitfield.caption: Analog Channel and Gain Selection Bits
bitfield.name: VADMUX

register.caption: The VADC Control and Status register
register.name: VADCSR

register.caption: Battery Protection OverCurrent Detection Level Register
register.name: BPOCD

register.caption: Battery Protection Short-Circuit Detection Level Register
register.name: BPSCD

register.caption: Battery Protection Deep Under Voltage Register
register.name: BPDUV

bitfield.caption: Deep Under-voltage Early Warning Interrupt Flag
bitfield.name: DUVIF

bitfield.caption: Charge Over-current Protection Activated Interrupt Flag
bitfield.name: COCIF

bitfield.caption: Deep Under-voltage Early Warning Interrupt Enable
bitfield.name: DUVIE

bitfield.caption: Pulse Width Modulation of OC output
bitfield.name: PWMOC

bitfield.caption: Pulse Width Modulation Modulation of OPC output
bitfield.name: PWMOPC

register.caption: CC-ADC Control and Status Register A
register.name: CADCSRA

bitfield.caption: When the CADEN bit is cleared (zero), the CC-ADC is disabled. When the CADEN bit is set (one), the CC-ADC will continuously measure the voltage drop over the external sense resistor RSENSE. In Power-down, only the Regular Current detection is active. In Power-off, the CC-ADC is always disabled.
bitfield.name: CADEN

bitfield.caption: The CADSI bits determine the current sampling interval for the Regular Current detection in Power-down mode. The actual settings remain to be determined.
bitfield.name: CADSI

bitfield.caption: When the CADSE bit is written to one, the ongoing CC-ADC conversion is aborted, and the CC-ADC enters Regular Current detection mode.
bitfield.name: CADSE

register.caption: CC-ADC Control and Status Register B
register.name: CADCSRB

bitfield.caption: Read While Write section read enable
bitfield.name: RWWSRE

register.caption: TWI Bus Control and Status Register
register.name: TWBCSR

bitfield.caption: TWI General Call Recognition Enable Bit
bitfield.name: TWGCE

bitfield.caption: Setting the BGD bit to one will disable the bandgap voltage reference. This bit must be cleared before enabling CC-ADC or V-ADC, and must remain unset while either ADC is enabled.
bitfield.name: BGD

bitfield.caption: BG Calibration of PTAT Current Bits
bitfield.name: BGCC

value.caption: Erase and Write in one operation
value.name: VAL_0x00
